Options.Table: (SELECT * FROM NameCode WHERE Type='AT') AS NameCode
Options.Label: Name

Fields.DbField: CASE WHEN tbFillFeeOther.nFillFee>0 and tbFillFeeOther.vcComments='' THEN '现金充值' WHEN tbFillFeeOther.nFillFee<0 and tbFillFeeOther.vcComments='' THEN '会员消费' WHEN tbFillFeeOther.nFillFee>0 and tbFillFeeOther.vcComments='银行卡' THEN '银行卡充值' WHEN tbFillFeeOther.nFillFee<0 and tbFillFeeOther.vcComments like '回收卡' THEN '会员卡回收' WHEN tbFillFeeOther.nFillFee>0 and tbFillFeeOther.vcComments like '补卡%' THEN '会员补卡' WHEN tbFillFeeOther.vcComments like '合并%' THEN '会员合并' ELSE '' END AS tbFillFeeOther.vcOperType

LeftJoins.Table: (SELECT * FROM NameCode WHERE Type='AT') AS NameCodeAT
